## Exercise 2

**a)**

fat = scan("../datasets/cholesterol.txt", what = list(before = 0, after = 0))


boxplot(fat)
attach(fat)

par(mfrow = c(1,2))
hist(before)
hist(after)

par(mfrow = c(1,2))
qqnorm(before)
qqnorm(after)

plot(before~after)
cor.test(before, after)
cor.test(before, after, method="spearman")

t.test(before, after, paired = TRUE) # are the samples paired? yes
